body:
Stack track:

```
url::Parsed::set_inner_parsed(url::Parsed const&) (in Electron Framework) (url_parse.h:194)
GURL::operator=(GURL) (in Electron Framework) (gurl.cc:170)
content::NavigationHandleImpl::DidRedirectNavigation(GURL const&) (in Electron Framework) (navigation_handle_impl.cc:195)
content::WebContentsImpl::DidGetRedirectForResourceRequest(content::RenderFrameHost*, content::ResourceRedirectDetails const&) (in Electron Framework) (web_contents_impl.cc:2573)
base::internal::Invoker<base::IndexSequence<0ul, 1ul, 2ul>, base::internal::BindState<base::internal::RunnableAdapter<void (*)(int, int, scoped_ptr<content::ResourceRedirectDetails, base::DefaultDeleter<content::ResourceRedirectDetails> >)>, void (int, int, scoped_ptr<content::ResourceRedirectDetails, base::DefaultDeleter<content::ResourceRedirectDetails> >), base::internal::TypeList<int, int, base::internal::PassedWrapper<scoped_ptr<content::ResourceRedirectDetails, base::DefaultDeleter<content::ResourceRedirectDetails> > > > >, base::internal::TypeList<base::internal::UnwrapTraits<int>, base::internal::UnwrapTraits<int>, base::internal::UnwrapTraits<base::internal::PassedWrapper<scoped_ptr<content::ResourceRedirectDetails, base::DefaultDeleter<content::ResourceRedirectDetails> > > > >, base::internal::InvokeHelper<false, void, base::internal::RunnableAdapter<void (*)(int, int, scoped_ptr<content::ResourceRedirectDetails, base::DefaultDeleter<content::ResourceRedirectDetails> >)>, base::internal::TypeList<int const&, int const&, scoped_ptr<content::ResourceRedirectDetails, base::DefaultDeleter<content::ResourceRedirectDetails> > > >, void ()>::Run(base::internal::BindStateBase*) (in Electron Framework) (bind_internal.h:343)
base::debug::TaskAnnotator::RunTask(char const*, base::PendingTask const&) (in Electron Framework) (task_annotator.cc:51)
base::MessageLoop::RunTask(base::PendingTask const&) (in Electron Framework) (message_loop.cc:482)
base::MessageLoop::DoWork() (in Electron Framework) (message_loop.cc:605)
base::MessagePumpCFRunLoopBase::RunWork() (in Electron Framework) (message_pump_mac.mm:328)
base::mac::CallWithEHFrame(void () block_pointer) (in Electron Framework) (call_with_eh_frame_asm.S:38)
...
base::MessagePumpNSApplication::DoRun(base::MessagePump::Delegate*) (in Electron Framework) (message_pump_mac.mm:680)

content::BrowserMainLoop::MainMessageLoopRun() (in Electron Framework) (browser_main_loop.cc:1339)
content::BrowserMainLoop::RunMainMessageLoopParts() (in Electron Framework) (browser_main_loop.cc:917)

```

I think it is an upstream bug which had already been fixed by https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src/+/314c15b4182d6c1c12c02dc2b2a2adc66dd4ed1e%5E%21/. We will get the fix once we upgraded to Chrome 48.
Also if you are using the `did-get-redirect-request` event in your code, it might help by removing it.

Thank you @zcbenz 

I've removed the `did-get-redirect-request`, but it's still crashing (https://gist.github.com/SamyPesse/d93f9bce28d7da455677).

I'll wait for the next release with chrome 48 and let you know if it fix it.
@SamyPesse The new crash report makes it look like another bug, can you try making an reproducible example for this? The most suspicious parts are the ones that call `loadURL`.

@zcbenz Here is some part of the app that reproduce the error: https://github.com/SamyPesse/electron-error

But the bug is happening after authenticating the user (you'll need a [gitbook](https://www.gitbook.com) account), feel free to create a tmp one if you want to and I can delete it after)
